description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: An issue was discovered in ROS2 Galactic Geochelone in version ROS_VERSION 2 and ROS_PYTHON_VERSION 3, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code, escalate privileges, obtain sensitive information, and gain unauthorized access to multiple ROS2 nodes.

Se descubrió un problema en ROS2 Galactic Geochelone en la versión ROS_VERSION 2 y ROS_PYTHON_VERSION 3, que permite a atacantes remotos ejecutar código arbitrario, escalar privilegios, obtener información confidencial y obtener acceso no autorizado a múltiples nodos ROS2.
